title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 4G finally hits UK pre-orders with unlimited data offer | Trusted Reviews
description: ![GalaxyWatch]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * EE says the watch is expected to ship within 14 days. However, the launchcomes two months after T-Mobile subscribers in the US were able to pick up the4G version of Samsung’s latest smartphone.In his review, our own Richard Easton awarded the Galaxy Watch an 8/10 score,praising the smart design and the rotating bezel-based UI. He was alsoimpressed by the bright and sharp display and the offline Spotify support.However, he didn’t see enough of a departure from previous Samsung watches,was unsatisfied with the Bixby assistant, and bemoaned the lack of availableapps and Samsung Pay support.**Will you be grabbing the Galaxy Watch 4G on EE? Drop us a line@TrustedReviews on Twitter.**
